message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too steep for me. I'm looking to spend closer to $60 for the product. Would that work for you?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to spend closer to $60, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get at least $100 for the product. How about we meet at $90?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  How about we split the difference between your last offer and mine, and settle on $75?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to go up to $110, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. How about we meet at $110?
